duties_responsibilities.duty: Achieve sales and profitability targets within a specified territory, building customer relationships and business scale.
Strategically identify opportunities for business growth, increasing existing product distribution within current accounts, finding new accounts, and launching new products within accounts.
Manage promotional spend within assigned budget and constantly seek to improve spend:result ratio.
Analyze, plan, and provide solutions to customers, such as distributors, stores, and restaurants.
Build strong customer relationships by regular sales calls and frequent communication with customer personnel.
Implement in-store/restaurant promotional activities to maximize brand presence and product turnover.
Provide merchandising expertise and support retailers to expand product placement/visibility in-store.
Participate in events to build a larger customer base and prospect for new events.
Resolve customer complaints by investigating problems, developing solutions, and recommending improvements.

Submit activity and results reports, such as daily call reports, weekly work plans, and monthly and annual territory analyses of sales metrics, sales activities, market trends, and competitive environment.
Maintain exhaustive, accurate, and up-to-date sales call and customer/territory information.
Monitor competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, products, new products, delivery schedules, and merchandising techniques.
Cooperate and communicate with other departments, especially marketing and supply chain.
Recommend changes in job content, products, services, and policies by evaluating current results, competitive developments, etc.
Actively improve own selling skills and performance by constantly seeking feedback and input from others.
Comply with all organizational processes and policies, exhibiting One Team Spirit.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Business, Sales, or a related field (MBA preferred)
